summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4662 for the improvement of the alley in supplemental plat of Glen Park Addition, being the alley from 18th Avenue North to 19th Avenue North between East John Street and East Thomas Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54091, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
